SqlAvailabilityGroup.description: Class representing the web model of SQL Availability Group.

availabilityGroupName.description: Gets or sets the SQL Availability Group Name.

availabilityGroupType.description: Gets or sets the type of availability group.             Currently there are two types of AGs Traditional and Distributed.

isMultiSubNet.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether AG is multi subnet or not.

clusterName.description: Gets or sets the Cluster name where AG is hosted.

availabilityReplicas.description: Gets the list of availability replica properties which together forms this availability group.

parentReplicaOverviewList.description:
Gets the parent availability replica overview if any.
            This would be
set with details of parent AG and AR for cases where this availability group is
a part of a distributed AG.
            Currently, we do not populate this
since discovery and linking of DAG(Distributed Availability Group) is not
implemented.

isPartOfDistributedAvailabilityGroup.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this Availability group is part of a
distributed AG.

isDeleted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is deleted.

createdTimestamp.description: Gets or sets the marking machine creation.

updatedTimestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp marking last updated on the machine.

availabilityGroupName.description: Gets or sets the name of the availability replica.

availabilityGroupArmId.description: Gets or sets the AG ARM ID which are part of this Replica.

SqlAvailabilityGroupReplicaInfo.description: Class which represents the SQL availability replica properties of type AG.

availabilityReplicaName.description: Gets or sets the SQL Availability Replica Name.

availabilityReplicaId.description: Gets or sets the SQL Availability Replica Id.

replicaType.description: Gets or sets the replica type of the availability group.

replicaState.description: Gets or sets the state of the availability replica.

replicaSyncStatus.description: Gets or sets the synchronization status of the replica.

replicaCommitMode.description: Gets or sets the commit mode of the replica.

replicaReadMode.description: Gets or sets the read mode of the replica.

replicaSeedMode.description: Gets or sets the seed mode of the replica.

sqlDatabaseReplicaInfo.description:
Gets or sets the Availability Replica object if Replica is of type database.
This is null in case Replica is
            of type AG. This is to be populated
in case of normal AG.

sqlAvailabilityGroupReplicaInfo.description:
Gets or sets the Availability Replica object if Replica is of type AG. This is
null in case Replica is
            of type database. This is to be populated
in case AG is of type DAG.
